Hero.description: Fullstack Engineer with 3 years of experience building fast, accessible, and scalable web applications using Node.js, React, Next.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Proven track record of improving performance, integrating complex APIs, and delivering features used by thousands of users.

About.title: ABOUT ME
About.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
About.description: I'm Mupa M'mbetsa Nzaphila, a Full Stack Engineer with strong professional frontend experience and solid full stack expertise. I enjoy building responsive, scalable, and user-friendly applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and turning complex problems into intuitive digital experiences. I care deeply about accessibility, performance, and thoughtful UI design — because great products should not only work, but feel good to use.
